definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: in Gilead, [[רָמׂת בַּגִּלְעָד]] Jos 21:38 (Gi; van d. H. Baer v:36; P), ´[[רָאמוֹת בַּגּ]]: (of Gad) De 4:43, 1Ch 6:65, ´[[רָאמׂת בַּגּ]]: Jos 20:8 (P), Ramwq [Jos 20:8 Arhmwq e)n (Th=| ) Galaad; usu. ´[[רָמת ג]]: (Remmaq [Eremaq, Ramwq, Rama (q)] Gal., etc.) 1Ki 4:13 + 19 t. K Ch (v. [[גִּלְעָד]]

, q.v.; site dub.; Onom. (Lag:287. 91) 15 m. W. of Philadelphia [Jer Ib.:145.31 says E!], hence Di:Ge 31:54 Buhl:G. 261 f. conj. el- Jal&Jaud, c. 17 Eng. m. NW. of Phil., and 3 m. S. of Yabbok; SMerrill:E. of Jordan, 284 ff.; Hast. DB. RAMOTH G. conj. (on gen. grounds) Jesrash, c. 28 m. N. of Phil.; GASm:G. 586 some place just S. of Yarmuk, cf. GACooke in Dr:Dt Add. xviii f., q.v. esp. against es-Salṭ Seetzem a.l). †

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: [[רָאמוֹת]], Levit. City in Issachar 1Ch 6:58 (Dabwr, LXXL Ramwq), prob. = [[רֶ֫מֶת]] Jos 19:21 (P; Remmas, A Ramaq), and [[יַרְמוּת]]
